testcase.classname: To Validate Add To Cart Feature
testcase.name: To validate adding and removing products in add to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User has to launch the browser and flipkart application...............passed When User has to search the product through search box......................passed And User has to select and adding product into cart.........................passed And User has to place order and login to the application....................passed And User has to selecting address and payment option........................passed And User has to remove the product from the cart............................passed Then User has to close the browser..........................................passed
